channel.title: Church on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in Church on PepsFeeder

item.title: The Catholic Church and Pope Francis plan to fight back against AI
item.description: On Friday, Pope Francis backed a doc that outlines how synthetic intelligence, in conjunction with facial recognition technology, desires to be regulated. This so-known as “Rome Demand AI Ethics” carries the endorsement of the Vatican as smartly as Microsoft and IBM.
